articles.title: Top Tech News Today: iPhone 15 Pre-Orders Start In India, Meta Reportedly Bringing Ads To WhatsApp, More - ABP Live
articles.description: Buyers can pre-order the newly launched iPhone 15 series in India starting today (September 15).

articles.author: Destin Legarie
articles.title: Insomniac Answers All of Our Questions About Spider-Man 2's PS5 Tech - IGN
articles.description: IGN sat down with members of Insomniac Games that worked on Spider-Man 2, this interview discusses the game from a technical perspective and what things did Insomniac do differently for its third entry in the Spider-Man series.
articles.content: Spider-Man 2 is a big moment for both the series and the PlayStation 5. As a PS5 exclusive, Spider-Man stands to be able to leverage the platform's technology in ways that previous games in the serie… [+30599 chars]
